full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 375 Filed 10/27/21 Page 2 of 2 LAW OFFICES OF BOBBI C. STERNHEIM more focused on unfounded inconvenience to its witnesses above prudence in seating a jury that can be fair and impartial. It is but another effort by the government to seek an undue and unreasonable advantage and it should not be countenanced. Very truly yours, /s/ BOBBI C. STERNHEIM cc: Government Counsel 2 DOJ-OGR-00005386
